charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1101_0100:
While walking around town,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across Clemont.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1101_0200:
Heliolisk was watching Clemont with a
worried expression...
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0402_0600: A-ah! W-w-well, I’m just doing some research!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_0700:
Oh! It's you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You really startled me...
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_0800:
Sorry, Heliolisk. I was really in the zone for a
while there.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_0900:
I’ve been conducting some research during my stay
on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1000:
I’m especially interested in the energy generated
by sync stones. My curiosity knows no bounds!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1100:
Obviously, when you’re talking energy, the first
thought has got to be electricity, right?
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1200:
Electricity is produced and converted by many
different things.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1300:
For example, Heliolisk can take in sunlight and
convert it into electricity.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1400:
If there were a way to convert the energy from
sync stones into electricity, it could really optimize
Pasio’s electrical generation!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0401_1600:
That’s right! You might be using it without even
realizing it.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_1900:
The energy released from sync stones is created
through the bonds Trainers have with their
partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2000:
Simply put, it’s creating energy through the power
of our thoughts and emotions!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2100:
The bonds of friendship between people and
Pokémon can illuminate our homes.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2200: What a wonderful thing, don’t you think?
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2300: Looks like Heliolisk feels the same way.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2400:
Actually, I’ve been working on an add-on for my
Poryphone that can utilize the power of bonds...
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_2500:
I got so caught up in my work that I haven’t been
able to explore Pasio much. *yawn*
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0301_2600: Looks like Heliolisk wants you to rest.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3000:
Hehe... I have a pretty bad habit of going off on
my own and losing myself in my work.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3100:
But in both Pokémon battles and science,
collaboration leads to success.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3200:
Thank you, Heliolisk. I shouldn’t push myself so
hard. And I should definitely get some rest.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3300:
Hey, I’ve got it! [Name:PlayerNickname ], why
don’t you help me test out my new prototype?
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1101_3400:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] agreed. [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] tested the
prototype while Clemont got some rest. Later,
Clemont took [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] feedback and began tinkering.
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1101_3500:
And after only a short time, Clemont’s invention
was complete!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3700:
I call it the “Light That Pulses Once in Reaction to
Sync Strength”!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3800: All right then, it’s time to ACTIVATE!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_3900: Hmm, I see... Yes, it’s just as I predicted!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0401_4100:
That’s right. It might’ve worked only once, but
even that was very important!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0302_4200: That’s the light of our bonds!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_0402_4300: Exactly! The future is now, thanks to this light!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_4400:
There are so many mysteries surrounding sync
strength... Sure, all that happened in this test was 
a single small light pulse, but...
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_4500:
with enough of those small lights, we could
combine them to create an enormous light that
could illuminate an entire city!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_4600:
Thanks for all your help today! It’d make me really
happy if we could work together again sometime!
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_4700:
The world illuminated by the power of the
bonds everyone shares...
charaepi_ch0131_00_citron/2301_1201_4800: That’s the future I’m working toward!
